body.p: A Connecticut-born soldier. Married to Louisa M. Wright. Father of Mary Wright, Edward Bradford Wright, and Rosa Wright Smith. Graduated from the United States Military Academy at West Point in 1841. Served in the Corps of Engineers. Promoted to brigadier general in September 1861. Commanded the Department of the Ohio for a period in 1863. Reassigned to the eastern theatre under various commands. Promoted to major general on May 12, 1864. Commanded a department in Texas following the war.
